## Description {#details}

An ID used in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/dbgopidmap">DbgOpIDMap</a> (below) to lookup a stored <a href="/docs/api/structs/livedebugvalues/dbgop">DbgOp</a>.

This is used in place of actual DbgOps inside of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/dbgvalue">DbgValue</a> to reduce its size, as <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/dbgvalue">DbgValue</a> is very frequently used and passed around, and the actual <a href="/docs/api/structs/livedebugvalues/dbgop">DbgOp</a> is over 8x larger than this class, due to storing a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a>. This ID should be equal for all equal DbgOps, and also encodes whether the mapped <a href="/docs/api/structs/livedebugvalues/dbgop">DbgOp</a> is a constant, meaning that for simple equality or const-ness checks it is not necessary to lookup this ID.

Definition at line 411 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-h">InstrRefBasedImpl.h</a>.
